title: Black hearted Barney Blackfoot
creator_credit: Dave Gibson, Gibson Film Productions and Yvonne MacKay
brief_description: The story of Billy and Lucy’s mean stepfather who is helped in his evil exploits by his friend the moving wardrobe. A humorous moral tale using sound effects with no commentary.
